scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ -o dist/css/
scripts.css-docs: cross-env-shell node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ -o site/static/docs/$npm_package_version_short/assets/css/docs.min.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/simplicss.min.css dist/css/simplicss.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/simplicss-grid.min.css dist/css/simplicss-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/simplicss-reboot.min.css dist/css/simplicss-reboot.css
